SanitizerConfig.summary:
NOTE Experimental The SanitizerConfig dictionary of the HTML Sanitizer API represents a sanitizer configuration object.
The configuration specifies what elements, attributes and comments are allowed or should be removed when inserting strings of HTML into an or , or when parsing an HTML string into a .
